review.description: Had it delivered through postmates. Honestly you'd be better off going to your local halal cart around the corner. $8 for chicken and rice?? No veggies of any kind in the chicken and rice and the salad that it always comes with was maybe 5 lettuce leaves, two slices of pickles and a slice of tomato. Just not worth it. The chicken itself was below par for me flavor wise. A definite skip.
review.author: Adam L.
